data.oai_dc:dc: Sex, snout vent length, and average lamellae count, toepad area, and limb length.Right and left measurements were averaged for limb length, toepad area, and lamella number on the forelimbs, as well as hindlimb length. We then took the mean of forelimb and hindlimb measurements, yielding one value per individual for limb length, toepad area, and lamella number.
